about_the_game:
More game content can be followed: Bilibili Wei Zeteng

Game Introduction:

#This is a free ARPG game developed for tutorials
#This game will be updated and fixed gradually with the tutorial
#This game is a teaching case of Bilibili Wei Zeteng, not an official game
#If there is something that everyone doesn't like, please don't give a negative review. Thank you all on your knees
#If you want to learn UE5 Blueprint game development and production, you can follow Bilibili Wei Zeteng
#A 3D adventure ARPG game with a cool visual style, featuring battles and upgrades. The game adopts a classic world saving storyline, with slightly clich é d lines that are very appealing to players. The cool skills and special effects on the screen make players who are familiar with the game love it. Every time they try different combo combos, they experience the pleasure, and action enthusiasts recommend getting started.

Kneel down and thank all the masters for their support~

name: 夏日与诗歌之旅

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: 64-bit Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 4代
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750TI
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 可在720p/60fps的情况下进行游戏
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: 64-bit Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7 7代
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 2070TI
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 可在1080p/60fps的情况下进行游戏

short_description: A 3D adventure ARPG game with a cool visual style, featuring battles and upgrades. The game adopts a classic world saving storyline, with slightly clich é d lines that are very appealing to players. The cool skills and special effects on the screen make players who have started this game love it
